DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetic Study Modified Release ( MR ) Formulations MIN-101 Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: 1 . Confirmed CYP 2D6 extensive metaboliser genotype 2 . Subject give voluntary write informed consent performance study related procedure 3 . Must 18 45 year age , inclusive 4 . Subject must healthy male female indicate protocol 5 . Agree abstain medication ( except allow birth control 21 day first dose MIN101 6 . Subject agree use method birth control outline protocol 7 . Must willing able communicate participate whole study . 8 . Willing eat food supply throughout study . 1 . A history clinically significant gastrointestinal disease , renal , hepatic , neurologic , hematologic , endocrine , oncologic , pulmonary , immunologic psychiatric disease condition , opinion principle investigator , would jeopardize safety subject impact validity study result 2 . Acute diarrhoea constipation 7 day predict first study day . 3 . Subject donate blood within 90 day plasma within 30 day study dose 4 . Regular alcohol consumption male > 21 unit per week Females > 14 unit per week ( 1 Unit = 1/2 pint beer , 25 mL 40or 125 mL glass wine ) 5 . Subject borderline long QTc Fridericia interval define screening reading > 430 msec male > 440 female personal familial history long QT syndrome 6 . Subject participate clinical trial within 90 day prior study initiation 7 . Females pregnant breast feed 8 . Subject use prescription medication overthecounter ( OTC ) medication , include vitamin supplement , within 21 day prior day l 9 . Subject treat known P450 206 3A4 enzyme alter drug within 30 day prior study 10 . Subject smoke used nicotine product within 2 month prior study 11 . Subject sought advice refer GP counsellor abuse misuse alcohol , nonmedical drug , medicinal drug substance abuse , e.g . solvent 12 . Subjects admit occasional past use cannabis exclude long negative drugsofabuse test abstinent cannabis use least 3 month 14 .
